item.Q:
Write the character:
to carry (hanging down from the hand); to lift; to put forward; to mention; (upwards character stroke); lifting (brush stroke in painting); a scoop for measuring liquid
item.A:
tí
提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down
item.A:
xìa
一下 yīxìa (used after a verb) give it a go; to do (sth for a bit to give it a try); one time; once; in a while; all of a sudden; all at once

item.Q:
Write the character:
(experienced action marker); to cross; to go over; to pass (time); to celebrate (a holiday); to live; to get along; excessively; too-; surname
item.A:
traditional: 過
guò
过程 (過程) guòchéng course of events; process

item.Q:
Write the character:
to ask; to invite; please (do sth); to treat (to a meal etc); to request
item.A:
traditional: 請
qǐng
请求 (請求) qǐngqiú request

item.Q:
Write the character:
(plural marker for pronouns and a few animate nouns)
item.A:
traditional: 們
men
我们 (我們) wǒmen we; us; ourselves

tiān
今天 jīntiān today; at the present; now

item.Q:
Write the character:
actually; place; classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc; particle introducing a relative clause or passive
item.A:
suǒ
所以 suǒyǐ therefore; as a result; so

item.Q:
Write the character:
many; much; a lot of; numerous; multi-
item.A:
duō
许多 (許多) xǔduō many; a lot of; much

traditional: 麼
me
那么 (那麼) nàme like that; in that way; or so; so; so very much; about; in that case

item.Q:
Write the character:
small; tiny; few; young
item.A:
xiǎo
小孩 xiǎohái child

item.Q:
Write the character:
(possessive particle, literary equivalent of 的); him; her; it
item.A:
之 (strokes unavailable)
zhī
之间 (之間) zhījiān between; among; inter-

item.Q:
Write the character:
to think; to believe; to suppose; to wish; to want; to miss
item.A:
xiǎng
思想 sīxiǎng thought; thinking; idea

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: obtain; get; gain; proper; suitable; proud; contented; allow; permit; ready; finished
2: a sentence particle used after a verb to show effect; degree or possibility
3: to have to; must; ought to; to need to
item.A:
1: dé 2: de 3: děi
得到 dédào to get; to obtain; to receive 觉得 (覺得) juéde to think; to feel 不得不 bùděibù to have no choice but

item.Q:
Write the character:
work; worker; skill; profession; trade; craft; labor
item.A:
gōng
工作 gōngzuò job; work; construction; task

item.Q:
Write the character:
to go out; to come out; to occur; to produce; to go beyond; to rise; to put forth; to occur; to happen; (a measure word for dramas, plays, or operas)
item.A:
chū
出来 (出來) chūlai to come out

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: also; in addition; more; still; else; still; yet; (not) yet
2: pay back; return; surname
item.A:
traditional: 還
1: hái 2: huán
还是 (還是) háishì or; still; nevertheless 还原 (還原) huányuán to restore to the original state

traditional: 電
diàn
电流 (電流) diànliú electric current

item.Q:
Write the character:
couple; pair; to be opposite; to oppose; to face; for; to; correct (answer); to answer; to reply; to direct (towards sth); right
item.A:
traditional: 對
duì
反对 (反對) fǎnduì to fight against; to oppose; to be opposed to; opposition

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: capital city; metropolis; surname
2: all; both (if two things are involved); entirely (due to)each; even; already
item.A:
1: dū 2: dōu

Write the character: xiǎng

to think; to believe; to suppose; to wish; to want; to miss

item.Q:
Write the character: dé
(dédào de dé)
item.A:
obtain; get; gain; proper; suitable; proud; contented; allow; permit; ready; finished
得到 dédào to get; to obtain; to receive

item.Q:
Write the character: de
(juéde de de)
item.A:
a sentence particle used after a verb to show effect; degree or possibility
觉得 (覺得) juéde to think; to feel

(bùděibù de děi)
item.A:
to have to; must; ought to; to need to
不得不 bùděibù to have no choice but

work; worker; skill; profession; trade; craft; labor

item.Q:
Write the character: chū
(chūlai de chū)
item.A:
to go out; to come out; to occur; to produce; to go beyond; to rise; to put forth; to occur; to happen; (a measure word for dramas, plays, or operas)
出来 (出來) chūlai to come out

item.Q:
Write the character: hái
(háishì de hái)
item.A:
traditional: 還
also; in addition; more; still; else; still; yet; (not) yet
还是 (還是) háishì or; still; nevertheless

Write the character: huán

pay back; return; surname Huan

item.Q:
Write the character: duì

traditional: 對
couple; pair; to be opposite; to oppose; to face; for; to; correct (answer); to answer; to reply; to direct (towards sth); right
反对 (反對) fǎnduì to fight against; to oppose; to be opposed to; opposition

item.Q:
Write the character: dū
(shǒudū de dū)
item.A:
capital city; metropolis; surname Du

item.Q:
Write the character: dōu
(dōudū de dōu)
item.A:
all; both (if two things are involved); entirely (due to)each; even; already
都督 dōudū city

item.Q:
Write the character: jī
(jīguān de jī)
item.A:
traditional: 機
machine; opportunity; secret
机关 (機關) jīguān organ; mechanism

traditional: 我們
wǒmen we; us; ourselves

traditional: 他們
tāmen they
suǒyǐ therefore; as a result; so
dédào to get; to obtain; to receive

traditional: 出來
chūlai to come out
chūlái to come out; to emerge
gōngrén worker

traditional: 人們
rénmen people
tíchū to raise (an issue); to propose; to put forward; to suggest; to post (on a website); to withdraw (cash)

traditional: 還是
háishì or; still; nevertheless

traditional: 那麼
nàme like that; in that way; or so; so; so very much; about; in that case
suǒyǒu all; to have; to possess; to own

traditional: 還有
háiyǒu furthermore; in addition; still; also

traditional: 你們
nǐmen you (plural)

traditional: 不過
bùguò only; merely; no more than; but; however; only
dàxiǎo dimension; magnitude; size; measurement
yīxìa (used after a verb) give it a go; to do (sth for a bit to give it a try); one time; once; in a while; all of a sudden; all at once

traditional: 下來
xìalai to come down; (after verb of motion, indicates motion down and towards us, also fig.); (indicates continuation from the past towards us); to be harvested (of crops); to be over (of a period of time); to go among the masses (said of leaders)
yǐxìa below; under; following

traditional: 小時
xiǎoshí hour
rúxìa as follows
